etymology.description: 入(入) (rù, "enter") + 一(一) (yī, "one") = gather from three sides

examples.chinese: 这幅画描绘了亼的独特形状(這幅畫描繪了亼的獨特形狀)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè fú huà miáohuì le jī de dú tè xíngzhuàng.
examples.english: This painting depicts the unique shape of 亼, resembling an open mouth flipped upside down.

examples.chinese: 古籍记载亼符号的古怪寓意(古籍記載亼符號的古怪寓意)，令后人赞叹不已(令後人讚嘆不已)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔ jí jì zǎi jī fú hào de gǔ guài yù yì, lìng hòu rén zàn tàn bù yǐ.
examples.english: Ancient texts record the bizarre symbolism of 亼, which inspires endless admiration from later generations.
